entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Components E2E consistently timing out in 7.0 and 6.0 #47080
  • Multiple Kestrel Libuv tests failing in 6.0 on win-arm64 #47078
  • DbContextHealthCheck does not handle exceptions #47074
    Backlog
  • “Serverless” pre-render Blazor WASM #47069
    Backlog

Closed

  • It will need about 18 mins to stop connection(disconnecting to disconnected) when it lost network(Like disble WiFi insterface). And it wil cause Linux Segmentation Fault when I try to call hub_connection::stop() while connection state is disconnecting. #46801
  • OutputCacheMiddleware throws NullReferenceException when trying to serve requests from cache #46333
    8.0-preview2
  • AJAX progress not triggering when using file uploader component in Blazor WebAssembly hosted on IIS #47053
  • Unusual environment behaviour/selection with dotnet watch in parent folder #46144
  • Hot reload not enabled if dotnet CLI initialized with arguments #31365
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Global exception handling #47052
  • dotnet watch does not work in eng\dogfood.cmd environment #42509

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Use new Chromium headless mode to fix E2E test timeouts (#46812) #47082
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Fix HRESULT check for IIS file watcher #47081
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Add support for JSON body vs. service inference #47079
    area-runtime
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
  • Add the standard set of TryParsable tests to implicity route/query. #47068
    area-runtime
  • Set InvariantGlobalization in api template #47066
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `0c5a96b` to `dbfe71c` #46954
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.16
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d925117` to `2d4f208` #46955
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d925117` to `2d4f208` #46957
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • [release/2.1] Remove doug from codeowners #47061
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46750
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46752
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Suppress downgrade error in hosting bundle #46843
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Remove Doug from CODEOWNERS #47056
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `f6fabbb` to `3583fc4` #46956
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Remove Doug from Codeowners #47057
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 6.0.16 #47076
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.5 #47077
    area-infrastructure
  • Skip HelixPlatform_QuickListenerIsSupported on win-arm64 #47072
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions.xml files #47073
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23156.3 #47062
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Fix MapAction_SingleTimeOnlyParam_StringReturn #47064
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Make BlazingPizza.Server sample work again #46953
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Blazor united initial startup apis for registering pages #46996
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • Add captainsafia to Http codeowners #47067
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #47003
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Remove some Linq usages from Routing #47004
    area-runtime
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor
  • Consolidate RDF and RDG tests (part 1) #47011
    area-runtime
  • Razor Component IResult #47023
    area-mvc, area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • fix github issue #46864 #46876
    area-security, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • JsonSubKeyClaim arrays #46878
    area-security, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
